conversation.content: *exhale* So I'm looking at my statement and there's all these random fees I don't understand?
Okay, um, let me pull up your account here... I see account ending in 3847. So you're asking about the international transaction fees, right? Those can definitely be confusing.
Yeah exactly, like I bought something online, I think it was maybe forty dollars and somehow I'm charged fifty-three?

Right, so what happens is, uh, when you purchase from an international merchant—let me see here, looks like transaction ID TRX-9847261—there's actually a 3.2% foreign transaction fee that gets added on top.
*sharp inhale* Wait, three percent? Nobody told me about that when I signed up, this is sort of ridiculous honestly.

Yeah, I totally get that frustration. Er, the fee disclosure is in the terms, page 47 section 12B, but I know nobody really reads all that. What I can do is see if you qualify for our international-friendly card that waives those fees.
I mean I probably should've checked but who reads forty-seven pages? *nervous laugh* Can you just waive them this time?
I wish I could, honestly. The system doesn't let me override fees from processed transactions like TRX-9847261 from November 15th. But, um, let me check something else for you real quick...
*sigh* Of course not. Look I travel for work, I buy from international sites all the time, this is gonna add up to hundreds probably thousands of dollars!

Oh interesting, so if you travel frequently for business, we actually have, er... hang on, I'm seeing you might qualify for our Premier Business account BUS-PREM-2024. That one has zero foreign transaction fees and actually reimburses past fees up to $500.
Wait really? *breath* Okay so how fast can we switch because I have another trip next week and I kind of need this sorted immediately.

Alright, so the approval is instant if you qualify. Hmm, let me run your profile through... okay, annual income checks out, credit score 742 is good. I can actually get you approved right now and expedite the card for arrival by Tuesday.
Tuesday? That's cutting it close, I fly out Wednesday morning, what if it doesn't arrive, I'm sort of panicking here because last time FedEx lost my package completely!

No no, don't worry. So what I'll do is, uh, mark this as priority overnight with tracking number... generating now... TRK-88291-EXPR. Plus I can add your new card to your digital wallet immediately, code DW-INSTANT-901, so you can use it right away on your phone.
*exhale* Oh thank God okay so the digital thing works internationally? Because I think sometimes, probably my regular cards don't work overseas and then I'm stuck.

Absolutely, the digital version works everywhere the physical card does. Er, I'm also seeing here that with the Premier Business account, you get access to our 24/7 international support line at +1-800-PREMIER-7. They can help if anything comes up during your trip.
*breath* This is actually way better than I expected when I called, I was ready to probably cancel everything and switch banks honestly!

*soft laugh* Well I'm really glad we could turn this around for you. Um, so I've credited those recent fees—that's $13.47 from the three transactions this month—back to your account as credit CR-20241120-FFW. Should show up within 24 hours.
Wait you're crediting them? I thought you couldn't— *nervous laugh* okay I'm not complaining but sort of confused now, how does that work exactly?

So technically I couldn't waive the original fees, but, uh, since you're upgrading to Premier, there's a "welcome adjustment" I can apply, reference code WADJ-PREMIER-3847. Basically it's our way of saying thanks for sticking with us instead of, you know, actually switching banks.
